tweet: Huge thanks to my constituent and friend Skylar for dropping off this amazing scrapbook! She has type 1 diabetes and I’ve had the opportunity to meet her over the years through @JDRFMinnesota. Because of Minnesotans like her, I will continue to push for diabetes research. pic.twitter.com/mI8GlUIBgQ

Stopped by the Otsego Prairie Center to catch curtain call at School House Rock Jr Live yesterday! Great to see how much work @SOARArtsMN has put into this production with help from @CMNArtsBoard. Great performance with important lessons about our political process! pic.twitter.com/K3pKKmKjZd
REMINDER: Join me tomorrow in Scandia for a town hall! Visit my website for more information:  https://emmer.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/emmer-announces-washington-county-town-hall …
33 years ago I married my best friend, and every day since, she has made me the happiest man alive. Happy Anniversary, Jacquie! pic.twitter.com/ECbIDT6XcQ

Great to catch @CompeerFinance today during #FarmCreditFlyIn2019! They discussed important services our farmers and ranchers require like crop insurance and ag financing! Farmers throughout #MN06 rely on these important services to allow them to keep feeding the world. pic.twitter.com/iblW8eNq7s

Great to see members of @GL94MN today in Washington! Important discussion about the benefit all Minnesotans would receive upon the necessary expansion of I-94. Thank you for coming by, and for advocating for vital transportation funding for our great state! pic.twitter.com/Ha4umJVH9W

Successful second session of our Young Women Leadership Program!Thanks to all of the incredible panelists and participants. Looking forward to our next session in August! #YWLP pic.twitter.com/IZkhiZgIxc

I will be hosting a town hall on July 31 at 7PM at the Scandia City Hall. I hope to see you there to discuss pressing priorities for our district. Visit my website for more information:  https://emmer.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/emmer-announces-washington-county-town-hall …
Great to see @bruce_gordon of @MnDPS_DPS and his family in Washington, D.C. this week! I love when Minnesotans stop by the office for a visit. pic.twitter.com/tdAklCMuFN

Welcome home, Master Sergeant Barnum! Thank you for your service. Our great state is beyond proud of the work our @TheRedBulls do at home and abroad. https://www.sctimes.com/story/news/local/2019/07/18/soldier-reunited-sons-waite-park-baseball-tournament/1772327001/ …

Today would have been my sister Bridget’s 57th birthday. She passed away from cancer, and we miss her everyday. We did not have a cure in time for her, but we can save future generations from this awful disease by advancing the research and innovation necessary to find a cure. pic.twitter.com/cx8XlZwFl4

Today's @FinancialCmte hearing was not only about @Libra_. It was an opportunity to amplify a discussion on cryptocurrencies. Lack of understanding by Congress and regulators will stifle blockchain technology, which stands to be a force of change for good. https://youtu.be/cOyvojBlJL4

I took to the House Floor to recognize the St. Cloud Police Department for receiving the #SutinCivicImaginationAward. My office was honored to assist them in securing the Cop House & I can't wait to see how this program continues to grow and serve #MN06! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6LQO5qFMr_U&t=1s …

The House voted to permanently reauthorize the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund. I was proud to co-sponsor and vote for this bipartisan bill that honors the heroes of that tragic day and cares for the first responders who still live with the effects of their service. #Renew911VCF

Can’t believe my sweet, talented and kind daughter Katie is 24 years old today. Happy birthday! Your mother and I are so proud of you. pic.twitter.com/AVFPhuENcz
